hero.title: Terms and Conditions
hero.subtitle: Read the terms and conditions carefully before using our services. These terms define your rights and responsibilities when using the platform.

intro.title: General Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Gulf Tourism platform. By accessing and using our site, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the site.
points: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice.
Your continued use of the site after any modifications means your acceptance of the updated terms.

subsections.title: User Eligibility
subsections.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use this site. If you are under 18, you must use the site under parental supervision.

subsections.title: Account Usage
subsections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. Any activity that occurs under your account is your full responsibility.

booking.title: Booking and Payment Terms
points: All bookings are subject to availability. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any booking for any reason.
When making a booking, you must provide accurate and complete information.
Prices displayed on the site are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
Payment must be completed in full according to the payment terms specified at the time of booking.
We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and electronic wallets.

refund.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: You can cancel your booking according to the cancellation policy specified at the time of booking. Cancellation fees may apply depending on the timing of cancellation.

refundProcess.title: Refund Process
refundProcess.content: Refunds will be processed within 7-14 business days from the approved cancellation date. The amount will be returned to the original payment method.

refund.note: Note: Cancellation and refund terms may vary depending on the type of service or offer booked.

liability.title: Legal Liability
liability.content: We strive to provide accurate information and high-quality services, but we are not responsible for:
points: Any errors or omissions in the content displayed on the site.
Any delays or cancellations by external service providers.
Any loss or damage resulting from your use of the site or services.
We may suspend or terminate your access to the site in case of violation of these terms.
We are not responsible for any content or services provided by third parties.

contact.title: Have Additional Questions?
contact.description: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us via email or phone.
